LOCATION

HACKETT | MILL is located at

201 Post Street, Suite 1000, San Francisco, CA 94108.

For inquiries please call

415 362 3377

or email art@hackettmill.com

HOURS of OPERATION

Tuesday - Friday, 10:30 am - 5:30 pm

and by appointment

STAFF CONTACT

Michael Hackett

Francis Mill

John Obrecht

Jessica Phillips

Sheetal Varma

HACKETT | MILL, founded by Michael Hackett and Francis Mill, presents rare works from the 1950s and 1960s by important American, European, and Asian artists.

The gallery focuses on historical movements that took place in the mid-twentieth century including American Modern, Post-War Abstract Expressionism and California/Bay Area Figurative Art.

Hackett | Mill represents the estates of David Park, Frank Lobdell, Robert Schwartz and the artists Brian Wall, Manuel Neri and Raimonds Staprans.

Michael Hackett and Francis Mill each bring over twenty years of expertise and education in the fine arts. Through their shared passion, Hackett | Mill presents a unique experience with art that is both scholarly and inspirational.
